title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is unnecessarily marked as dirty even though no changes are made.
OB: The file is marked as dirty by the code assist even if no changes are made.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open a file in the editor.
2. Trigger code assist.
3. Observe if the file is marked as dirty without making any changes.
